name: Dracula's Plans
description:
Every 400 years, Dracula gets together everyone from the local village. He always tries to see if civilization has learned some manners. Alas, another disappointment. This time, it's because of STEVE!

Now, everyone must die! More importantly, Steve...

Controls: 
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
W - Jump
Space Bar - Attack
ESC - Pause

Dracula has 3 types of attack. If you are close you will swipe your enemy as melee. If you are mid distance, you will teleport to the enemy and then suck their blood for a hit point. If you are farther away, you will fly toward your enemy.

** Pressing Space during the intro will speed it up by 20% each time you press it. Basically, spam space bar at the intro if you don't want to read the initial story. **

Credits:
Art, Music, Sounds, Design - Greg 
Development, Design - Yanni 

This was an entry for the Gooseberry Jam, Theme: You are the Villain
